comment: A weak version of ~ dvcnvre , valid for both real and complex domains but under the hypothesis that the inverse function is already known to be continuous, and the image set is known to be open. A more advanced proof can show that these conditions are unnecessary. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
